00020 static const string CLIENT_IDENTIFIER = "lfc";
00021 static const string CLIENT_VERSION = "1.0";
00022 
00023 void LastFmClient::handshake(const string& user, const string& pass)
00024 {
00025     string response;
00026     try
00027     {
00028         m_UrlClient.get(createRequestString(user, pass), response);
00029     }
00030     catch (logic_error& e)
00031     {
00032         throw ConnectionError(e.what());
00033     }
00034 
00035     vector<string> lines = tokenize(response, "\n");
00036     if (lines[0] != "OK")
00037     {
00038         throw logic_error("Failed to connect to last.fm: " + lines[0]);
00039     }
00040     else if (lines.size() != 5)
00041     {
00042         throw logic_error("Failed to connect to last.fm: invalid response length");
00043     }
00044 
00045     m_SessionId = lines[1];
00046     m_NowPlayingUrl = lines[2];
00047     m_SubmissionUrl = lines[3];
00048 }
00049 
00050 void LastFmClient::nowPlaying(const NowPlayingInfo& info)
00051 {
00052     throwOnInvalidSession();
00053 
00054     string response;
00055     try
00056     {
00057         m_UrlClient.post(m_NowPlayingUrl, createNowPlayingString(info), response);
00058     }
00059     catch (logic_error& e)
00060     {
00061         throw ConnectionError(e.what());
00062     }
00063 
00064     vector<string> lines = tokenize(response, "\n");
00065     if (lines[0] != "OK")
00066     {
00067         throw logic_error("Failed to set now playing info: " + lines[0]);
00068     }
00069 }

00071 void LastFmClient::submit(const SubmissionInfo& info)

00082 void LastFmClient::submit(const string& postData)
00083 {
00084     throwOnInvalidSession();
00085 
00086     string response;
00087 
00088     try
00089     {
00090         m_UrlClient.post(m_SubmissionUrl, postData, response);
00091     }
00092     catch (logic_error& e)
00093     {
00094         throw ConnectionError(e.what());
00095     }
00096 
00097     vector<string> lines = tokenize(response, "\n");
00098     if (lines[0] != "OK")
00099     {
00100         throw logic_error("Failed to submit info: " + lines[0]);
00101     }
00102 }

00104 
00105 string generateMD5String(const string& data)
00106 {
00107     md5_byte_t digest[16];
00108 
00109     md5_state_t state;
00110     md5_init(&state);
00111     md5_append(&state, reinterpret_cast<const md5_byte_t*>(data.c_str()), data.size());
00112     md5_finish(&state, digest);
00113 
00114     stringstream md5String;
00115     for (int i = 0; i < 16; ++i)
00116     {
00117         md5String << setw(2) << setfill('0') << hex << static_cast<int>(digest[i]);
00118     }
00119 
00120     return md5String.str();
00121 }
00122 
00123 string generateAutenticationToken(const string& pass, time_t timestamp)
00124 {
00125     return generateMD5String(generateMD5String(pass) + getPostData(timestamp));
00126 }
00127 
00128 string LastFmClient::createRequestString(const string& user, const string& pass)
00129 {
00130     time_t timestamp = time(0);
00131 
00132     stringstream request;
00133     request << "http://post.audioscrobbler.com/?hs=true&p=1.2"
00134             << "&c=" << CLIENT_IDENTIFIER
00135             << "&v=" << CLIENT_VERSION
00136             << "&u=" << user
00137             << "&t=" << timestamp
00138             << "&a=" << generateAutenticationToken(pass, timestamp);
00139 
00140     return request.str();
00141 }
00142 
00143 string LastFmClient::createNowPlayingString(const NowPlayingInfo& info)
00144 {
00145     stringstream nowPlaying;
00146     nowPlaying << "&s=" << m_SessionId << info.getPostData();
00147     return nowPlaying.str();
00148 }
00149 
00150 string LastFmClient::createSubmissionString(const SubmissionInfo& info)
00151 {
00152     stringstream submission;
00153     submission << "&s=" << m_SessionId << info.getPostData();
00154     return submission.str();
00155 }
00156 
00157 string LastFmClient::createSubmissionString(const SubmissionInfoCollection& infoCollection)
00158 {
00159     stringstream submission;
00160     submission << "&s=" << m_SessionId << infoCollection.getPostData();
00161     return submission.str();
00162 }
00163 
00164 void LastFmClient::throwOnInvalidSession()
00165 {
00166     if (m_SessionId.empty())
00167     {
00168         throw logic_error("No last.fm session available");
00169     }
00170 }
